de.eckhartarnold.client

Class PanelOverlayBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.eckhartarnold.client.PanelOverlayBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttachmentListener, ResizeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlPanelOverlay, FilmstripOverlay

    public abstract class PanelOverlayBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResizeListener, AttachmentListener
    Abstract base class for the control panel overlay classes.

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_PANEL_POSITION

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_PANEL_POSITION
        the key in the "info.json" dictionary that determines the panel position. Possible values: "top", "bottom", "upper left", "upper right", "lower left", "lower right"
